landing.title: Empowering Students to Thrive in Tech
landing.subtitle: SFU Surge is an inclusive, student-led organization that aims to ignite curiosity and excitement for the future of technology while guiding students in developing the skills they need for career success.

card.subtitle: WHAT'S SFU SURGE?
card.title: Home to Simon Fraser University's largest hackathon
card.paragraph: A super cracked team of technology enthusiasts dedicated to hosting events, workshops and programs that help students explore their passion for technology, connect with industry professionals, and gain valuable skills.

events.title: EVENTS
events.subtitle: Check out our exciting lineup of events designed to inspire, educate, and connect tech enthusiasts!

involvement.subtitle: Get Involved
involvement.title: Join SFU Surge in shaping the future of technology.

card.subtitle: STAY IN THE LOOP
card.title: Be the first to find out about exciting news, like when our next events are!
card.paragraph: The organizers of Simon Fraser University's largest hackathon, SFU Surge provides an inclusive space for students to explore their passions, connect with industry professionals.
